post:
Access2.IT launched new website for our Hostio.Solutions label that offers IPv4 / IPv6 Rental and other infrastructure services.

https://hostio.solutions/

The availability of IPv4 ranges is now becoming limited. As RIPE is sold out there are no more /22 available and there is a growing waiting list at RIPE for /24 ranges. We can still provide clean IP spaces for an affordable price.

Order now your IPv4 range

  • IPv4 /24 lease, €125 per month (invoicing per month)

  • IPv4 /24 lease, €95 per month (invoicing per 3 months)

  • IPv4 /24 lease, €85 per month (invoicing per 6 months)

  • IPv6 /48 lease, €9 per month (invoicing per 12 months)

  • Lower rates when leasing per 6 months

  • First payments via SEPA or Crypto (BTC and ETH).

  • Renewals possible via Credit Card (3D secure) and PayPal.

Other information:

  • Set your own RIPE netname and description.
  • Verified companies can also have their own “Responsible organisation” and abuse handling.
  • We will assign the prefix as a “ASSIGNED PA”.
  • Proxies are allowed but contact us for the conditions
  • We do NOT provide IP addresses for spam, phishing or any other illegal activities.
  • Blacklisted IP’s must be resolved within 24 hours.
  • All prices exclude VAT where applicable.

Company details:

Access2.IT Group B.V.
